text: أَوۡ تَقُولَ لَوۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

translation.en: Or [lest] it say, "If only Allah had guided me, I would have been among the righteous
translation.id: atau (agar jangan) ada yang berkata, ‘Sekiranya Allah memberi petunjuk kepadaku tentulah aku termasuk orang-orang yang bertakwa
